name: THE BOX VR
description: The Box is a new arcade game of Virtual Reality that will test your reflexes, your coolness and your ability to strategy. An action game that challenges you to keep playing again and again.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel™ Core™ i7 Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better
